root: ^You return with some sturdy sticks and quickly sit down to assemble them.
^You had packed tape in your bag for restraining possessed people, but now you use it to tape the sticks together in the shape of a grail.
^After it’s done, you splash it with holy water.
^Smart move. The holy water will weaken the ghost when he touches it.
^It’s a feeble attempt to replicate the Holy Grail, but it should work.
